nodes.text: The Clone Wars Episode Guides are free articles on StarWars.com that provided an in-depth look into the episodes of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. They were first introduced on October 3, 2008 after the release of Ambush, the first episode in the series. Normally a preview of the actual guide was released before the episode airs, which contained only a link to the episode preview, short synopsis and release information. After the airing of the episode the guide was updated with most of its content and then, about a week later, it got updated one more time with the link to the actual episode streaming on StarWars.com.
In September of 2011, all episode guides were removed from StarWars.com following the site's redesign. They were replaced with brand-new guides.
Each episode's Guide contains following features:
